document_data.name: Daluth
document_data.mainbody: '''Daluth''' was a [[Shar]]ran faithful during the mid-8{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: He was a bald man with purple and black robes.{{cite book/Elminster Ascending/The Temptation of Elminster|692|16}} He spoke with a thick drawl.
document_data.Possessions: He looted a plethora of magic from [[Karsus' Keep]].
document_data.Relationships: Daluth was one of [[Elryn]]'s dreadspells. He was not greatly loyal in extreme situations.
document_data.Abilities: As a dreadspell, he wielded borrowed arcane power.
